name: Believable Veils
text: The teachings of your deity help you keep your secrets safe.
prerequisites: Caster level 3rd, ability to cast at least one glamer or figment, worshiper of Sivanah.
benefit: Once per day when you create a glamer or figment effect, you can empower the effect so that the DC to disbelieve it is 2 higher than normal.
text_zh: 你所信奉的神祇教谕使你可以安全的保护自己的秘密。
prerequisites_zh: 施法者等级3级，可以施放至少一个具有五官幻象（Glamer）或虚假幻象（Figment）子系的法术，信仰西芙娜（Sivanah）。
benefit_zh: 每天一次，你在创造一个具有五官幻象（Glamer）或虚假幻象（Figment）的效果时，你可以使识破此效果的DC+2.
